arm_group.description: glyceryl trierucate and glyceryl trioleate mixture, 2-4 tablespoons once daily

brief_summary.textblock:
OBJECTIVES: I.  Evaluate the clinical efficacy of combination glyceryl trierucate and
      glyceryl trioleate (Lorenzo's Oil) therapy in boys with X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy.

      II.  Compare the frequency and severity of neurological disability of study patients with
      untreated historical controls.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Glycerol Trierucate on Clinical Course of Adrenoleukodystrophy

detailed_description.textblock:
PROTOCOL OUTLINE: This is an open label study. Patients must follow dietary instructions as
      provided by the investigator. Patients receive 2-4 tablespoons of a mixture of glyceryl
      trierucate and glyceryl trioleate oil once daily.  Patients complete a neuropsychological
      scoring scale questionnaire to measure neurological disability.  Patients undergo physical
      examinations including magnetic resonance imaging and magnetic resonance spectroscopy of the
      head.

      Patients are followed monthly for 6 months, then every 3 months until death.

criteria.textblock:
-  Biochemically proven asymptomatic X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy

          -  Platelet count in normal range

intervention.description: Patients receive 2-4 tablespoons of a mixture of glyceryl trierucate and glyceryl trioleate oil once daily.

clinical_study.official_title: Study of Glyceryl Trierucate and Glyceryl Trioleate (Lorenzo's Oil) Therapy in Male Children With Adrenoleukodystrophy

other_outcome.time_frame: every month during first year, then every 1-3 months

overall_official.affiliation: Hugo W. Moser Research Institute at Kennedy Krieger, Inc.

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.time_frame: 6 months post intervention, then every 3 months until age 13 years
